appName.message: Bookmarks Checker - Duplicate and Dead Links

description.message: Check your bookmarks for duplicates or dead links.

homePageTip.message: This Extension is used to manage your bookmarks. Please select an action to start.

useDomaiForDuplicationCheckTip.message: If enabled, the domain of the URL will be used for duplication check. Otherwise, the full URL will be used.

maxRequestsTip.message: The maximum number of concurrent requests, the larger the number, the faster the check speed, but it may cause the server to refuse service

checkInvalidResultTip.message: There may be errors in the checking results, so please be careful when deleting.

requestTimeoutTip.message: The maximum time to wait for a response from the server. A longer time means a slower check speed. If the request time exceeds this value, it will be considered a timeout.

selectFolderActionTip.message: Select folders to check, leave empty to check all

donateTip.message: If you like this extension, you can donate to support the development of this extension.
